fields.name: url
fields.description: url to the map in the digitised file viewer

fields.name: coordinates
fields.description: map coordinates as a string, either a point or a bounding box (format is 'W--E/N--S', eg: 'E 130⁰50'--E 131⁰00'/S 12⁰30'--S 12⁰40')

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: point from coordinates or centre of box

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: point from coordinates or centre of box
